item.title: CVE-2023-51374|2023-12-29T10:29:48.434Z -- zerobounce -- zerobounce%20email%20verification%20%26%20validation
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ZeroBounce ZeroBounce Email Verification & Validation allows Stored XSS.This issue affects ZeroBounce Email Verification & Validation: from n/a through 1.0.11.
